metadata.Title: CVE-2014-3876 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in Frams' Fast FileEXchange (F*EX, aka fex) before fex-20140530 allow remote attackers toinject arbitrary web script or HTML via the (1) akey parameter to rup or(2) disclaimer or (3) gm parameter to fuc.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-3876` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

fex - 20140530-1
fex-utils - 20140530-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: fex package in esm-apps/xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '20140530-1').
